title: Sampler
medium:
Medium: silk, linen, and cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross and stem stitches on a plain weave foundation. Apparently later addition in red cross and surface satin stitches.
description: Alphabet introduced by Maltese cross. Scattered motifs in the field dominated by religious motifs. Horse-drawn chariot at upper left and animals at right.
name: Sampler
